hibernate-mapping.query: FROM Authority auth WHERE auth.resource.id = :resourceId AND auth.operation.id = :operationId AND auth.operation.types like (:types)
FROM Authority auth WHERE auth.resource.id in (:resourceIds) AND auth.operation.id in (:operationIds) AND auth.operation.types like (:types)

FROM Authority auth WHERE auth.resource.identifier in (:columnId) AND auth.operation.id in (:operationId) AND auth.resource.type = :resourceType AND auth.operation.types like (:types) AND auth.resource.site.id = :siteId
FROM Authority auth WHERE auth.resource.identifier in (:columnId) AND auth.resource.type = :resourceType AND auth.operation.types like (:types)
